MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the TD9 postcode area of Hawick , affecting properties in Mclagan Drive and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 7.01pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the complexity of the repair required and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by Midnight. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10.37pm on the 1st February 2021.
